key.name: mode
key.description: Algorithm to use for window placement (0 = Cascade, 1 = Centered, 2 = Smart, 3 = Maximize, 4 = Random, 5 = Pointer)

key.name: multioutput-mode
key.description: Selects how window placement should behave if multiple outputs are selected (0 = Use active output device, 1 = Use output device with pointer, 2 = Use output device of focussed window, 3 = Place across all outputs)

key.name: force-placement-match
key.description: Windows that should forcedly be placed, even if they indicate the window manager should avoid placing them. (match)

key.name: position-matches
key.description: Windows that should be positioned by default

key.name: position-constrain-workarea
key.description: Keep placed window in work area, even if that means that the position might differ from the specified position

key.name: mode-matches
key.description: Windows that should have a certain positioning mo+de

key.name: viewport-matches
key.description: Windows that should be positioned in specific viewports by default
